In the Matter of PARAMOUNT PUBLIX CORPORATION, Debtor (COOK, NATHAN & LEHMAN, Appellants). Paramount Pictures, Inc. (Formerly Paramount Publix Corporation, the Debtor Herein), et al., Appellees. No. 332. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit May 4, 1936. Cook; Nathan & Lehman, of New York Qt for appellants ’ Simpson, Thacher & Bartlett, of New York City (Thomas D. Thacher, Edwin L. Weisl, and Richard Jones, III, all of *1015New York City, of counsel), for appellee Paramount Pictures, Inc.

Before MANTON, SWAN, and AUGUSTUS N. HAND, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Order (12 F.Supp. 823) affirmed.
